department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by December 14, 2022 by 14:00 EST. All bids submitted after 14:00 EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.
